title: Weyl modules for twisted toroidal Lie algebras
authors: Ritesh Kumar Pandey, Sachin S. Sharma
abstract:
In this paper, we extend the notion of Weyl modules for twisted toroidal Lie
algebra $\mathcal{T}(\mu)$. We prove that the level one global Weyl modules of
$\mathcal{T}(\mu)$ are isomorphic to the tensor product of the level one
representation of twisted affine Lie algebras and certain lattice vertex
algebras. As a byproduct, we calculate the graded character of the level one
local Weyl modules of $\mathcal{T}(\mu)$.
